jamila ekka thanabim osse koyi tharamak durak yanna athida "wane pannaraya" labapu hati, "rathu hima" rathu wechcha hati, ballekuge hadawatha, "tom soyar"(rani ranathunga rajapaksha pariwarthanaya) ekka gal guhawe hira unata passe koyi tharam bayenda hitiye eliyata enna bari weyi kiyala, "hakalbari fin" ekka tom tharam rasawath nathi unath wirakam kiyaknam kiyala kalada, rudraprayaghi wyaghraya, siwanipalli kalu diwiya, tsawohi mini kanno, thith rakusiya, indiyanu wanakatha, powalgaraye thanikadaya, kumaoohi minikanno, wage poth wala hitapu jim kobat, kenath andarsan ekka jiwithe pawa paraduwata thiyala koyi tharamaknam dadayam gaman gihin thiyenawada sharlok homs saha dosthara mahaththaya ekka eyala karapu (passe chandana mendis ekka) hama rahas parikshana katayuththakatama sahabhagi unath ekka.
